alert.note: Alert for Benton; Kandiyohi; Meeker; Morrison; Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 10:34AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Meeker, northwestern Benton, central Stearns, southwestern Morrison and northeastern Kandiyohi Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1034 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Upsala to near Atwater. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Upsala around 1040 AM CDT. Bowlus around 1050 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Little Falls and Paynesville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 141 and 164. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 149 and 164. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 80 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
